feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-04-10T08:04:17.342721Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Meta 使用单体架构仅在五个月内交付线程</stitle>; <id>;https://www.infoq.com/news/2024/04/meta-threads-instagram -5-months/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T07:03:53.822486Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.infoq.com/news/2024/04/meta-threads -instagram-5-months/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;RyeCombinator</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RyeCombinator</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://imgopt.infoq.com/fit-in/3000x4000/filters:quality(85)/filters:no_upscale()/news/2024/04/meta-threads-instagram -5-months/en/resources/1meta-instagram-arch-1712608215163.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Meta 通过重新利用 Instagram 的整体架构，加快了 Threads 的开发，这是一种文本优先的微博服务，并在 Twitter 被马斯克收购后的五个月内推出。尽管用户采用率很快，但仍拥有 100 个用户五天内下载量达到 100 万次，重用带来了技术债务，需要未来的平台分离。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-used-monolithic-architecture-to-ship-threads-in-only -五个月" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39987466" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;价值数百万美元的洛杉矶抢劫案是无缝、复杂的，隐秘</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2024-04-06/30-million-theft-from-la-vault-was-seemless-sophisticated-daring</id >; <更新>;2024-04-10T06:03:53.824513Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2024-04-06/30-million-theft-from -la-vault-was-semless-sophisticated-daring"/>; <作者>; <名称>;walterbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=walterbell</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/439601c/2147483647/strip/true/crop/3992x2992+0+0/resize/1200x899 !/quality/75/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fb7%2Ff2%2F42c1f00e4d93a373a5ecb21e5565%2F1432124-me-garda-money-heist-03-mjc.jpg"样式=“宽度：220px；高度：165px;" />;<br />;执法官员正在调查复活节周日发生在圣费尔南多谷 Gardaworld 仓库的洛杉矶历史上最大的抢劫案之一，估计损失在 2000 万至 3000 万美元之间. 这次行动非常复杂，专家认为，由于对该设施的布局和安全性有精确的了解，这可能是内部人员所为，当局现在正在寻找与类似的全球抢劫案的潜在联系。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#multimillion-dollar-la-heist-was-seamless-sophisticated-stealthy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=39977443" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纯 Go 编写的兼容 MySQL 的数据库引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/dolthub/go-mysql-server</id>; <更新>;2024-04- 09T20:03:53.824937Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/dolthub/go-mysql-server"/>; <作者>; <name>;mliezun</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mliezun</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dolthub/go-mysql-server /main/mascot.png" style="width: 220px; height: 231px;" />;<br />;Go-mysql-server 是一个与 MySQL 兼容的 SQL 引擎，允许通过实现自定义后端来查询任何数据源，以 Dolt 作为其主要数据库。它是 MySQL 的替代品，但有特定的限制，但可用于内存数据库测试。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-mysql-known-database-engine-writing-in-pure-go" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39983490" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2024 年的 PHP</stitle>; <id>;https://stitcher.io/blog /php-in-2024</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T04:03:53.825332Z</更新>; <link href="https://stitcher.io/blog/php-in-2024"/>; <作者>; <名称>;theThree</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=theThree</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://stitcher.io/resources/img/blog/php-in-2024/01.png" style="width: 220px; height: 98px;" />;<br />;这篇文章表达了对 PHP 未来的热情，尽管在关键贡献者离开后最初存在担忧，并引用了 PHP 基金会的发展和属性挂钩等新功能。它强调了 FrankenPHP 对 PHP 应用程序的性能提升和 Laravel 的成功生态系统扩张，包括新员工和 Livewire 等工具。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#php-in-2024" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39986724" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我们构建 PriceLevel 是为了了解公司为 SaaS 支付的费用</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pricelevel.com/< /id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T20:03:53.825724Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.pricelevel.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cluo21</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cluo21</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.pricelevel.com/_astro/英雄.DEhveYyl_2h96AA.svg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 139px;" />;<br />;了解公司实际为软件支付的费用。PriceLevel 可让您了解隐藏在“联系我们”后面的价格。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#show-hn-we-built-pricelevel-to-find-out-what-c​​ompanies-pay-for-saas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39980222" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2 轴多头光定位器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bunniestudios.com/blog/2024/a-2-axis- multihead-light-positioner/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T04:03:53.826129Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bunniestudios.com/blog/2024/a-2- axis-multihead-light-positioner/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;etiam</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=etiam</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://bunniefoo.com/iris/2024/imager-head_sm.jpg”风格=“宽度：220px; height: 294px;" />;<br />;本文详细介绍了 IRIS 技术的机械设计改进，重点介绍了一种可实现精确角度调整的新型光定位系统。作者讨论了创建天顶角和方位角的挑战和解决方案控制，集成 Jubilee 平台的现有设计。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-2-axis-multihead-light-positioner" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39968297" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用不可靠的代理构建可靠的系统</stitle>; <id>;https://www.rainforestqa.com/blog/building -reliable-systems-out-of-unreliable-agents</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T21:03:53.826536Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.rainforestqa.com/blog/ Building-reliable-systems-out-of-unreliable-agents"/>; <作者>; <name>;fredsters_s</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fredsters_s</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.rainforestqa.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/building-reliable-maciej-og.png" style= “宽度：220px； height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了构建可靠的人工智能系统所面临的挑战，强调虽然人工智能有利于演示，但它在现实世界的应用中经常失败。它提供了创建可靠系统的过程，强调评估系统、可观察性和迭代改进的重要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-reliable-systems-out-of-unreliable-agents" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39984209" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;是的，社交媒体是青少年精神疾病流行的一个原因</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.afterbabel.com/p/phone-based-childhood-cause-epidemic</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T20:03:53.826920Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .afterbabel.com/p/phone-based-childhood-cause-epidemic"/>; <作者>; <名称>; throwup238 </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= throwup238 </ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F %2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F50b837d0-ae20-48c8-b9f8-fee6dd6da67f_1600x755.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 104px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了社交媒体对青少年心理健康的影响，怀疑论者怀疑其危害，危言耸听者则引用负面影响的证据。作者反驳了怀疑论者，介绍了研究和现实世界有证词表明社交媒体对青少年，尤其是女孩产生有害影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#yes-social-media-is-a-cause-of-the-epidemic-of-teenage-精神疾病" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39983233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;生活有多深？</stitle>; < id>;https://thereader.mitpress.mit.edu/how-deep-does-life-go/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T01:03:53.827315Z</更新>; <link href=" https://thereader.mitpress.mit.edu/how-deep-does-life-go/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;胡克</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=胡克</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thereader.mitpress.mit.edu/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/biosphere-700x420 .jpg" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;James Powell 的文章详细介绍了深海探索的历史历程，从挑战者号探险队推翻无冰理论到在热液喷口发现化学合成。它强调了海底下重要的微生物生命，可能与地表生物量相当，以及对地外生命的影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-deep-does-life-go" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39974042" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;牛磁铁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.stanfordmagnets.com/cow-magnets.html< /id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T18:03:53.827695Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.stanfordmagnets.com/cow-magnets.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Tomte </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.stanfordmagnets .com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Cow_Magnets.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：138px;" />;<br />;牛磁铁通过吸引摄入的金属来预防牛的硬件疾病，从而避免组织损伤。它们通过口服给药并保留在瘤胃中，从铝镍钴合金演变为更有效的稀土磁铁设计。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cow-magnets" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=39982024" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;显示 HN：QWANJI</stitle>; <id>;https://byronicalpatrick.github.io/qwanji/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T02:03:53.828096Z</更新>; < link href="https://byronicalpatrick.github.io/qwanji/"/>; <author>; <name>;byronical</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=byronical</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;#qwanji <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-qwanji" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39965123" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPT-4 Turbo with Vision 是编码的倒退</stitle>; <id>;https://aider.chat/ 2024/04/09/gpt-4-turbo.html</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T01:03:53.828465Z</更新>; <link href="https://aider.chat/2024/04 /09/gpt-4-turbo.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;anotherpaulg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anotherpaulg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://aider.chat/assets/aider.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 108px;" />;<br />;OpenAI 最新的 GPT-4 Turbo with Vision 在 aider 的编码基准上得分最低，为 62%，表现出“懒惰编码”的趋势。尽管对新模型完全支持，但 aider 默认为gpt-4-1106-preview，最强编码器。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpt-4-turbo-with-vision-is-a-step-backwards-for-coding" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39985596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对科幻小说的痴迷让我陷入了心理战</stitle>; <id >;https://buttondown.email/thehypothesis/archive/how-a-science-fiction-obsession-led-me-to/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T04:03:53.828844Z</更新>; <link href="https://buttondown.email/thehypothesis/archive/how-a-science-fiction-obsession-led-me-to/"/>; <作者>; <name>;MaysonL</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=MaysonL</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.buttondown.email/images/74f2ad0d- 1868-4f64-9556-6e84b9a3ca42.png?w=960&fit=max" style="宽度: 220px;高度：166px;" />;<br />;作者讨论了他们即将出版的关于美国心理战历史的书，其灵感来自于心理战士和科幻小说作家保罗·莱恩巴格 (Paul Linebarger) 的生活。这本书探讨了类型小说和心理战的重叠之处。心理战，以及莱恩巴格对美国宣传的影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-science-fiction-obsession-led-me-to-psychological-war" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39986593" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;揭秘 Shadow DOM</stitle>; <id>;https://thetshape.dev/p/demystifying -the-shadow-dom</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T03:03:53.829250Z</更新>; <link href="https://thetshape.dev/p/demystifying-the-shadow-dom" />; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages% 2Fe1d3b790-8277-47b4-a390-f53855554042_1136x538.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 105px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了 Shadow DOM 在 Web 开发中的作用，允许将样式和脚本封装在附加到元素的隐藏 DOM 中，从而增强组织性和可重用性。它还强调了其复杂性和潜力使用 Shadow DOM 的安全问题，建议开发者了解其正确的应用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#demystifying-the-shadow-dom" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39967685" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;湾区工人因在火车站内建造秘密公寓而被指控</stitle>; <id>;https://therealdeal.com/旧金山/2024/04/06/two-bay-area-railway-workers-charged-for-building-secret-apartments-inside-train-stations/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T02:03:53.829630 Z</更新>; <link href="https://therealdeal.com/sanfrancisco/2024/04/06/two-bay-area-railway-workers-charged-for-building-secret-apartments-inside-train- station/"/>; <author>; <name>;blackhawkC17</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=blackhawkC17</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://static.therealdeal.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/LA-TA-Partners-files-for-bankruptcy-on-452-unit-Playa-Vista-project-FEATUREIMG_v2 -150x106.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 156px;" />;<br />;两名前 Caltrain 官员因在半岛火车站内非法将办公室改造成公寓而面临重罪指控。在加州住房建设成本高昂的情况下，他们因低成本改建而受到赞赏。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bay-area-workers-charged-for-building-secret-apartments-inside-train-stations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39976483" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ScreenAI：用于 UI 和视觉情境语言理解的视觉法学硕士</stitle>; <id>;https://research.google/blog/screenai- a-visual-language-model-for-ui-and-visually-situated-language-understanding/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T18:03:53.830027Z</更新>; <link href="https: //research.google/blog/screenai-a-visual-language-model-for-ui-and-visually-situated-language-understanding/"/>; <author>; <name>;gfortaine</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gfortaine</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-research2023-media /original_images/Screenshot_2024-03-18_at_4.24.29PM.png" style="width: 220px; height: 163px;" />;<br />;```json { "summary": "ScreenAI 是一种视觉语言模型，旨在理解 UI 和信息图表，但由于其复杂性而面临挑战。在新颖的数据集和两阶段训练过程的帮助下，它在各种任务上取得了优异的结果。" } ``` <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#screenai-a-visual-llm-for -ui-and-visually-situated-language-understanding" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39981623" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;坚定的邮件服务器（自托管一体式邮件服务器）现在作为管理 WebUI</stitle>; <id>;https://stalw.art/blog/stalwart-webadmin/</id>; <updated>;2024-04- 09T20:03:53.830426Z</updated>; <link href="https://stalw.art/blog/stalwart-webadmin/"/>; <作者>; <name>;clemiclemen</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clemiclemen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://stalw.art/assets/images/screencast-setup-780bc42a88c6e41ad8925d242c2bf469。 gif"样式="宽度：220px； height: 128px;" />;<br />;Stalwart Mail Server 0.7.0 版引入了基于 Web 的管理工具，可简化管理并提升性能，包括更快的邮箱检索和提高存储效率的 LZ4 压缩。此更新代表了重大进步安全高效的电子邮件服务器解决方案。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stalwart-mail-server-self-hosted-all-in-one-mail-server-now-as-an- admin-webui" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39983018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧盟新技术法律正在发挥作用——小型浏览器赢得市场分享</stitle>; <id>;https://www.forth.news/threads/66161a684e6a1465f62f6a3b</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T06:03:53.831266Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /www.forth.news/threads/66161a684e6a1465f62f6a3b"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jaredwiener</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jaredwiener</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.forth.news/api/ogThreadImg?threadId=66161a684e6a1465f62f6a3b" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;在欧盟立法迫使 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌、微软和苹果让用户更容易切换后，欧盟的独立浏览器公司在第一个月就发现用户数量激增根据六家公司向路透社提供的数据，竞争对手。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eu-s-new-tech-laws-are-working-small-browsers-gain-market -share" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39987131" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示HN：我做了一个离散逻辑网卡</ stitle>; <id>;https://qdiv.dev/posts/eth2/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T08:03:53.831666Z</更新>; <link href="https://qdiv.dev /posts/eth2/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ynoxinul</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ynoxinul</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://qdiv.dev/eth2/overview-eth.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 184px;" />;<br />;文章详细介绍了作者在构建具有分立逻辑组件的计算机系统方面的进展，该系统现在能够运行网络应用程序并具有用于以太网连接的自制 MAC 层模块。他们还创建了一个 C 编译器来支持小型 TCP/IP 库。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-made-a-discrete-logic-network-card" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39976640" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Juicebox：消除加密密钥恢复的麻烦</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.juicebox.xyz/blog/key-to-simplicity-squeezing-the-hassle-out-of-encryption-key-recovery</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T01:03:53.832041Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.juicebox.xyz/blog/key-to-simplicity-squeezing-the-hassle-out-of-encryption-key-recovery"/>; <作者>; <名称>; inmygarage</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=inmygarage</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets- global.website-files.com/64650413ab0c96a6b686cac9/660f4513b9f0d9e441fc9f04_fZYOFrHTUdz7miul7gW6e8AyXs0rabAMH11vxxLw8IZsHEw3vFSgjWLFnP9bADF-9aVmld8KJJ0qKFugc ww8DPyA7Mvg66-B37U4jDiB4GHGUf7M--Jy2QBgrvO1frHeQAojdP5Gbfoz-ZCc6w8hCow.png" style="width: 220px; height: 174px;" />;<br />;密码学通过保护单个密钥来简化数据保护，但管理和恢复该密钥给用户带来了挑战。Juicebox 通过分配信任并允许使用简单的 PIN 进行恢复来解决这些问题，而无需依赖单方或硬件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#juicebox-squeezing-the-hassle-out-of-encryption-key-recovery" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39980750" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么 Windows 98 安装程序的一部分看起来比其他部分更旧？(2020)</stitle>; <id>;https ://retrocomputing.stackexchange.com/questions/14903/why-does-part-of-the-windows-98-setup-program-look-older-than-the-rest</id>; <更新>;2024-04 -10T01：03：53.832420Z </更新>; <link href =“https://retrocomputing.stackexchange.com/questions/14903/why-does-part-of-the-windows-98-setup-program-look- old-than-the-rest"/>; <author>; <name>;xeeeeeeeeeeenu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xeeeeeeeeeenu</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/SMpPi.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;Windows 98 的安装过程分为三个阶段，从 DOS 环境过渡到最小的 Windows 3.x 系统，然后过渡到完整的 Windows 98 操作系统。此过程允许在提供一致的用户界面的同时适应每个阶段操作环境的限制。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-does-part-of-the-windows-98-setup-program-look-older-than-the -rest-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39985630" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;小型媒体发行的崩溃</stitle>; <id>;https://lithub.com/the-small-press-world-is-about-to-fall-apart-on-the-collapse-of-small-press-distribution/</id>; <更新>; 2024-04-09T19:03:53.832799Z</更新>; <link href="https://lithub.com/the-small-press-world-is-about-to-fall-apart-on-the-collapse -of-small-press-distribution/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Paul-Craft</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Paul-Craft</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s26162.pcdn.co/wp-content/themes/rigel/images/social_logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;美国主要的独立图书发行商Small Press Distribution (SPD)突然关闭，导致400多家出版商无法发行、欠款并面临财务危机。正在寻找替代方案，并努力应对 SPD 关闭对其运营和收入的影响。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-collapse-of-small-press-distribution" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39982300" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英特尔 Gaudi 3 人工智能加速器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.intel .com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/vision-2024-gaudi-3-ai-accelerator.html</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T17:03:53.833169Z</更新>; < link href="https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/vision-2024-gaudi-3-ai-accelerator.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;goldemerald< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=goldemerald</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;您无权访问 " ;http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/vision-2024-gaudi-3-ai-accelerator.html"在此服务器上。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#intel-gaudi-3-ai-accelerator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39981032" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Neco – C 协程库</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tidwall/neco</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T20 :03:53.834289Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/tidwall/neco"/>; <作者>; <name>;tidwall</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=tidwall</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/958e875ed9961295855f27cfdb7d56936f0b50f80b1db3bc4565c5711df7b0be/tidwall/neco" style="width: 220px ；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Neco 是一个用于使用协程进行并发编程的 C 库，专注于 I/O 和网络的易用性，而不是为了可扩展的多线程运行时。它提供了与使用 C11 的项目的简单集成，并包括带有基准测试的 Bluebox 等示例。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-neco-coroutine-library-for-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39971984" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;阿里巴巴创始人马云发表长篇内部帖子走出阴影</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/ alibaba-Founder-jack-ma-steps-out-shadows-with-long-internal-post-2024-04-10/</id>; <更新>;2024-04-10T05:03:53.834658Z</更新>; <链接 href="https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/alibaba-Founder-jack-ma-steps-out-shadows-with-long-internal-post-2024-04-10/"/ >; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;请启用JS并禁用任何广告拦截器<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#alibaba-Founder-jack-ma-steps-out-from-shadows-with-long-internal-post" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39986974" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lambda 屏幕：纯 Lambda 演算中的分形</stitle>; <id>;https://text. marvinborner.de/2024-03-25-02.html</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T18:03:53.835033Z</更新>; <link href="https://text.marvinborner.de/2024 -03-25-02.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mmphosis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mmphosis</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>;<img src=“https://text.marvinborner.de/res/lambdaScreenTriangle.png”风格=“宽度：220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了“Lambda Screen”，一种使用 lambda 演算生成图像（包括无限详细的分形）的方法，并解释了如何使用 lambda 项对像素和屏幕进行编码和渲染。还提供了示例和源代码以供进一步探索。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lambda-screen-fractals-in-pure-lambda-calculus" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39976557" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;制作 RISC-V 操作系统（第 3 部分）：管理可用内存</stitle>; <id>;https:// traxys.me/riscv_os_buddy.html</id>; <更新>;2024-04-09T21:03:53.835435Z</更新>; <link href="https://traxys.me/riscv_os_buddy.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;traxys</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=traxys</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /traxys.me/public/bump_allocator.png" style="width: 220px; height: 90px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了使用设备树和凹凸分配器来管理物理内存来初始化内核中的内存。它还概述了实现伙伴分配器以有效处理内存分配和碎片。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-an-risc-v-os-part-3-managing-free-memory” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39983910" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
